description:
In the Vedic Tradition, all power sources from Shakti: Shakti is the divine feminine life force energy. The unfotunate impact of the suppression of the Divine Feminine Life force energy is that modern women juggling career, family, and relationships, have gotten so caught up in the go-go, do-do trance of the hypermasculine that you’ve lost touch with the source of your authentic feminine power.



This leaves you feeling like you’ve never been in touch with your inner Godis or it’s been so long, you’re afraid she’s gone for good. Maybe the wake-up call has come in the form of burn-out, depression, anxiety, lack of creativity, sexual disinterest or “dysfunction.” Maybe your relationship, career or identity is falling apart. Perhaps, on the surface things look okay but underneath, your feminine soul is dying: longing to feel, breathe and Re-member who you are.

You’re in the right place. Because the Godis within you isn’t dead, she is in her slumber. I can help you reawaken Her.

This is a 5 Module course going over 5 Ways our Feminine Frequency is Harmed and how to heal.
title: Invoking Shakti
